title: 6.3 Master Challenge 2
question:
Prepare a table in Excel and add the date of birth of your friends and family.

Task 1: Extract the day, month and year from the Date of birth.
Task 2: Apply data validations on the fi elds Day, Month and Year.

Refer to the following image for a hint.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
